criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Jaethal has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Jaethal’s personal biases, one of Jaethal’s resistances, or one of Jaethal’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Jaethal has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Jaethal’s personal biases, one of Jaethal’s resistances, or one of Jaethal’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Jaethal is susceptible to flattery when actually Jaethal is resistant to flattery.
